title: "Crunchy" Salad
introduction: This winter salad is a delightful mix of crisp textures and bold flavors, perfect for when fresh vegetables are scarce. Featuring crunchy apples, toasted walnuts, and a hint of creamy gorgonzola, it offers a satisfying, fresh bite.
ingredients: 3 to 4 Belgian endive, separated into leaves
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 medium apple, such as gala, Fuji, or Braeburn, cored and thinly sliced
1 small fennel, trimmed and thinly sliced
instructions: Fan the endive leaves out on 4 serving plates.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the oil, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste.
Add the apple, fennel, and green onions and toss well. Add the gorgonzola and toss again.
Scoop the salad mixture onto the base of the endive. Sprinkle with the nuts and serve immediately.
